title: Lennard Naumann
text: Hi! I’m a a researcher in the Institutions and Political Inequality unit at the WZB Berlin Social Science Center, and an affiliated member of the Research Training Group The Dynamics of Demography, Democratic Processes and Public Policy (DYNAMICS). My work focuses on intergroup relations, prejudice, and outgroup avoidance, using experimental and quasi-experimental methods. In addition, I am interested in webscraping and the use of Large Language Models (LLM) in the social sciences. Feel free to get in touch: lennard[dot]naumann[at]wzb[dot]eu
